# layoutManagedSubviews()

**Instance Method**

Loads the selection from the text input view and lays out the selection-related views.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func layoutManagedSubviews()
```

## Reporting changes to the selection

- **setNeedsSelectionUpdate()**: Tells the system to update the selection UI to match the current selection state.
